result.reason: Basic plugin infrastructure exists but is minimal (only supports menu items) and lacks essential hooks for connections/protocols and unit tests.
result.approach: Expand IPlugin/IPluginHost to expose connection lifecycle events and tree access, harden PluginManager against null references, and add comprehensive unit tests.
